alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:26PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN INDIANA AND EASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 926 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from near Brockway to 11 miles southwest of Punxsutawney. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Reynoldsville, Brockway, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Big Run, Rossiter, Marion Center, Glen Campbell, Rochester Mills, and Anita. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 88 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
